tooltip.en: The date the specimen was collected. While dates can be entered using your preferred format, the value will be converted and stored as an ISO-8601 numeric format (YYYY-MM-DD). Note that unknown month and days can be entered as “00”. For example, a collection with a date of “March 1956” can be entered as “1956-03-00”. Example(s): 1983-09-15, 1983-07-00, 1934-00-00. See Darwin Core's eventDate.

meta.name: Date
meta.source: Darwin Core Quick Reference Guide, TDWG
